title: Workable Jobs Scraper
description: Scrapes public job listings from jobs.workable.com. You can provide search keywords, Workable start URLs, or both, and optionally include cookies for authenticated access.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of Workable search, list API, or job detail URLs to start from. The scraper will enqueue additional pages from these seeds.

keyword.title: Keyword(s)
keyword.description: Optional search keyword. Ignored if a start URL already specifies a query.

posted_date.title: Date Posted
posted_date.description: Filter jobs by posting date when building API queries.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job detail records to collect before stopping.

maxPagesPerList.title: Maximum Pages per List
maxPagesPerList.description: Limit how many paginated list responses to fetch for each start URL or query.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent HTTP requests executed by the crawler.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Using Apify Proxy is recommended to avoid rate limits.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Optional list of cookies to send with every request. Each cookie should be an object with 'name' and 'value'. Example: [{"name": "sessionid", "value": "abc123"}].
